video.title: Ella the Elephant
video.synopsis: Join Ella, an imaginative elephant who uses her magic hat to create all kinds of fun and adventures for her friends on Elephant Island.

episodes.synopsis: Belinda starts an "exclusive" club; Ella and Frankie don't see eye to eye when they team up to build a racer for the Elephant Island soapbox derby.
episodes.title: Girls’ Club / Soapbox Squabble

episodes.synopsis: Ella and her friends venture into the forest to earn their Trunk Trooper Badges; when Ella's mom gets a cold, Ella helps out at the bakery.
episodes.title: Trunk Troopers / Ella in Charge

episodes.synopsis: Ella and her friends make a cake for Elephant Island's Junior Cake-Baking Contest; Ella has a backyard sleepover so Tiki can experience camping.
episodes.title: Ella Bakes a Cake / Camp Ella

episodes.synopsis: The school's big talent show is here, but Ella doesn't have an act; Ella gets picked to be the playground safety sheriff, badge and all.
episodes.title: Ella’s Got Talent / Safety First

episodes.synopsis: Ella and Frankie take care of Captain Kelp's lighthouse while he's away; Picture Day is coming at Ella's school and Belinda wants it to be special.
episodes.title: Ella Sheds Some Light / Stylish Ella

episodes.synopsis: Tiki gets stage fright before the school play; to celebrate the 100th day of the school year, the students must bring in 100 favorite things.
episodes.title: Hat Mishap / Ella’s Top 100

episodes.synopsis: Ella and her friends find a treasure map and set out on an adventure; Ella loses Frankie's helicopter in a prickly bush.
episodes.title: Treasure Hunters / Ella Borrows Trouble

episodes.synopsis: When a member of the soccer team gets hurt, Ella is reluctant to fill in; Elephant Island holds its annual kite-flying contest.
episodes.title: Ella on the Ball / Up, Up and Away

episodes.synopsis: Ella hosts a fancy tea party in her backyard; it's open house at the school and everyone's parents are coming.
episodes.title: Tea Party Trouble / Home Again

episodes.synopsis: Ella and Frankie plan the best Mother's Day ever, but the weather has other ideas; the school gets a brand-new scoreboard.
episodes.title: Stormy Mom Day / Team Spirit

episodes.synopsis: The carnival finally comes to town, and Frankie sprains his ankle; Ella and her friends take care of Tiki's pet monkey, Lola, while she's away.
episodes.title: Ella’s Carnival / Monkey Business

episodes.synopsis: It's time for Swellaphant, Elephant Island's biggest and best holiday; Ella and her mom find old toys and knickknacks to sell at the big street sale.
episodes.title: That’s Swellaphant! / Hello Dolly

episodes.synopsis: Ella and Tiki are invited to a fancy sleepover at Belinda Blue's house; Belinda, Tiki and Frankie run for class president and all ask Ella to help.
episodes.title: Ella’s Sleepless Sleepover / Ella for Class President

episodes.synopsis: Belinda challenges Frankie to a "winner-takes-all" race; Ella gets behind on her ant farm project for the science fair.
episodes.title: Ready, Set, Go? Slow?! / Ella’s Antics

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Mercer promises the kids a ride on his pedal float in the big parade; Ella and her friends take Captain Kelp's ferry to Snowy Island.
episodes.title: Parade Problem / Tiki’s Snow Fun

episodes.synopsis: Ella gets the hiccups at the worst possible time; Ella and her friends help with the new Queen Tusk exhibit at the museum, but a piece vanishes.
episodes.title: Ella’s Hiccups / Queen Tusk’s Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Ella's birthday is near and she's really excited, but her friends are acting strange; it's homecoming on Elephant Island, but all is not perfect.
episodes.title: By Invitation Only / Seashell Serenade

episodes.synopsis: Frankie wants to set a record, he just doesn't know which one; Ella overhears Tiki tell Mrs. Briggs that she's moving.
episodes.title: Trunk Your Record / Tiki’s Moving Day

episodes.synopsis: Ella and Frankie become superheroes: Super-Ella and Fantastic Frankie; the Elephant Island museum honors the inventor of the Trunk Accordion.
episodes.title: Super-Helpful Elephant Heroes / Ella Goes to the Birds

episodes.synopsis: Frankie challenges Belinda to a public dance-off; Ella starts a school newspaper, but nobody is reading it and Tiki thinks she knows why.
episodes.title: Ella’s Dance Off / Picture This

episodes.synopsis: Ella accidentally mixes up Frankie and Belinda's test scores; Tiki's all-time favorite author visits Elephant Island.
episodes.title: Frankie the Brain / Tiki’s Quest

episodes.synopsis: It's Halloween and Frankie wants to show off his pumpkin carving, but it goes all wrong; Ella takes over Sammy and Mikey's paper route.
episodes.title: Frankie’s Perfect Pumpkin / Ella’s Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: Ella and her friends have a special sleepover at the museum; Ella's grandmother visits Elephant Island and meets Ella's friends.
episodes.title: Jurassic Sleepover / Grandma’s Visit

episodes.synopsis: The kids help out in Mayor Blue's office but he's suddenly called away; Ella's hat acts up when she uses it to get out of chores.
episodes.title: Mayor Belinda / Ella’s Haywire Hat

episodes.synopsis: A famous filmmaker visits Elephant Island to make his next big movie; Ella's dad takes the kids out on his ship and makes them official crew members.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Ella / Ella’s Island

episodes.synopsis: Things get out of hand when Ella and Frankie baby-sit Frankie's little brother; Ella discovers an unexpected guest living in her bedroom.
episodes.title: Ella Elephant Sits / Ella’s Pet Problem
